Text: Law Conferenceis the first announcement regarding the upcoming Enron Law Conference I will be sending all email correspondence to bcc so that you will not have to scroll down through a list of all law conference invitees See attached file TEASERdoc TEASERdoc

Enron Law Conferenceplease find the RSVP form for the Enron Law Conference and a cover letter regarding same Complete the RSVP form and return it no later than Friday February th via email to or fax it to See attached file rsvp letterdoc See attached file rsvp formdoc rsvp letterdoc rsvp formdoc
RSVP form for the Enron Law Conference has been received Thank you for your attention to this matter

ReDan J Hyvl on PM To Sara CT cc Subject Re Sara Can you change my Thursday afternoon activity from Relaxing at the Resort to Rafting on the Guadalupe River Sara Davidson on AM To BCC cc bcc Dan J HyvlHOUECT Subject Your RSVP form for the Enron Law Conference has been received Thank you for your attention to this matter

Enron Law Conference ReminderforgetRSVP forms are due no later than Friday February th If you have not already sent in your form please be sure to complete all of the information on the RSVP form and fax the form to or email it to Also for your information Sea World will be open Friday April th Sunday April th if you are staying for the weekend Fiesta Texas has not set their schedule yet but if you are interested let me know and I will keep you posted
